b1ch1.title: Who are you calling a coward?
b1ch1.caption: A true warrior never backs down from a challenge.

b1ch1.title: Off to a good start
b1ch1.caption: Died before reaching the first checkpoint.

b1ch1.title: Honesty is the best policy.
b1ch1.caption: A clean mouth and an honest hand will take a man through any land.

b1ch2.title: Smooth talker
b1ch2.caption: Choosing the right words at the right time can be a daunting task for many, but you make it look so easy.

b1ch2.title: Tough as nails
b1ch2.caption: Got stabbed in the neck with a dagger and lived to tell the tale.

b1ch2.title: Martial arts master
b1ch2.caption: Successfully disarmed an opponent while fighting barehanded.

b1ch2.title: An unlikely ally
b1ch2.caption: Sometimes, friends can come from the most unexpected places.

b1ch3.title: A message in the sky
b1ch3.caption: It's a beautiful night for stargazing, don't you think?

b1ch3.title: One man army
b1ch3.caption: Singlehandedly defeated a small army of one hundred armed men, as well as their leader.

b1ch3.title: That was close!
b1ch3.caption: Saved a friend in the nick of time from an incoming dart.

b1ch4.title: A noble sacrifice
b1ch4.caption: Gave your own life to save a friend's.

b1ch4.title: Defeated Cutthroat Dave
b1ch4.caption: Won a duel against Cutthroat Dave.

b1ch4.title: I really kneed a break!
b1ch4.caption: Break both of your knees from a fall.

b1ch5.title: Stat device wielder
b1ch5.caption: Upon lending the stat device to Daren, you make an unexpected discovery.

b1ch5.title: Admitted liar
b1ch5.caption: Sometimes you just have to grab the bull by the horns.

b1ch5.title: A good deed
b1ch5.caption: Even a small act of selflessness can go a long way.

b1ch5.title: Shameless
b1ch5.caption: Take the credit for someone else's deeds, without any shame.

b1ch6.title: Defeated Tyrath
b1ch6.caption: Won a duel against Tyrath, the king of all dragons.

b1ch6.title: Berserker mode activated
b1ch6.caption: Accidentally maximized all of your stats in a fit of rage.

b1ch6.title: Full immersion
b1ch6.caption: Experience what your in-game character sees, first hand.

b1ch7.title: Violence is not the answer
b1ch7.caption: Why bother to fight, if you can just bluff your way to victory?

b1ch7.title: Golem crusher
b1ch7.caption: Destroy at least one rock golem by yourself in a fight.

b1ch8.title: Vive la democratie!
b1ch8.caption: Win a democratic vote by a small margin.

b1ch8.title: First piece of the puzzle
b1ch8.caption: Find the first piece of the puzzle made by Varathia's greatest architect.

b1ch8.title: Hydra slayer
b1ch8.caption: Kill a hydra with your own hands.

b1ch9.title: Keen observer
b1ch9.caption: When inside enemy territory, you should always mind your surroundings.

b1ch9.title: A wise decision
b1ch9.caption: Throwing away your pride is never easy, but sometimes there is no other way.

b1ch10.title: Defeated ogre shaman
b1ch10.caption: Won a duel against the shaman from the ogre stronghold.

b1ch10.title: A toast!
b1ch10.caption: Shared a drink with Hadrik to celebrate your most recent victory.

b1ch10.title: A touching reunion
b1ch10.caption: Helped Rose make up with an old friend.

b1ch11.title: A mysterious symbol
b1ch11.caption: Discover a strange marking engraved on the side of a harmless toy.

b1ch11.title: Stillwater slayer
b1ch11.caption: Defeated five stillwaters all by yourself.

b1ch11.title: No casualties
b1ch11.caption: No members of your group died in the first book.

b1ch11.title: Average Joe
b1ch11.caption: Finished the first book without leveling up a single stat.
